item.title: Tahir's Bio

item.title: Career
item.author: mail@tahirhashmi.com (Tahir Hashmi)
item.description: 20 years of experience in software development, leadership and innovation at 100M+ user companies valued over $10B. Domain experience in e-commerce, cloud services, gaming and social media.
